name: MarkFritz
0:
”Alexa, open Mark Fritz”
”Alexa, start Mark Fritz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mark fritz
des: Start your day with inspirational thoughts by Mark Fritz. Mark Fritz is an international specialist on leadership. He acts as speaker, mentor, coach and professor, has spoken on leadership and the power of ownership in over fifty countries throughout the world, and has taught at business schools across Europe. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
